title: (VIDEO) Major gas disaster averted due to quick thinking in Baddegama
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A major disaster was averted when a group of quick-thinking bystanders took measures into their own hands to douse a gas cylinder that was in flames in Baddegama on Sunday (13).
According to reports, the gas cylinder caught fire when workers were preparing meals at a restaurant in Baddegama, during the early hours on Sunday (13).
Serious damage was caused to the restaurant’s food preparing areas, said the workers.
Cut taxes on fuel, says Gammanpila while asking why SLPP is silent on price hike?
